articles.title: About PMR Data Consulting
articles.description: Who we are and what we do
articles.contents:
Peter Rabinovitch
is the founder of PMR Data Consulting. He has extensive real world data
science experience with some of the largest technology companies in the
world, as well as the theoretical knowledge affoarded by a PhD in
Probability and Statistics. He has co-lead Data For Good
Ottawa, a group of volunteer data
scientists who apply their expertise to solving the problems of local
charities. He shares his expertise with MBA students at University of
Ottawa.


Our approach to data science (click the triangles to see details):

All real-world data sets contain anomalies
It is the job of the data scientist to ensure that anomalies are caught,
mitigated, and most importantly, that their impact is understood by
stakeholders before business decisions are made.
Anomalies may be data entry errors,
How can you modify the data entry procedure to prevent the
errors?

Coding errors,
Does code need to be changed to prevent similar errors from
happening again?

Or some facet of your business that you do not yet understand.
What insights are the anomalies clues to?

The important question is “what do they mean to your business?”

Using just one number to describe any real-world scenario is
misleading
Your business is too complex to be captured by just one metric. You also
need to know a likely range for the metric (eg. a confidence interval),
and how this metric interacts with other metrics.

We know that insights must be in business terms, or their value
may be lost
The results must be communicated to stakeholders in the language of
their business in such a way that the implications of the data science
work is clear, or the project may have no business impact.
Guided by these principles, PMR Data Consulting specializes in
helping businesses extract the most important insights from their data.

articles.title: PMR Data Consulting
articles.description: Specializing in extracting insights about your business
articles.contents:
Want to better understand your business via your data, but don’t know where to start? We are here to help.

At PMR Data Consulting, we specialize in extracting insights from your data. Our services are tailored to uncover hidden patterns to help you make better data-based business decisions.

Click About to find out a little more about who we are, and Projects to see some of the projects we’ve worked on. Then contact us at pmr.data.consulting@gmail.com to start a conversation.
Looking for insights in the data your business generates can be like looking for pearls on the beach.
